list.name: Twitter

steps.code: .twitter { position: relative; width: 300px; height: 300px; } .twitter div { position: absolute; border-radius: 100%; background-color: #00aced; } .twitter div[class*='-x'] { background-color: #000; } .twitter .body { top: 16px; left: 15px; width: 206px; height: 206px; } .twitter .body-x { top: 56px; left: -6px; width: 150px; height: 150px; } .twitter .head { top: 78px; left: 148px; width: 72px; height: 72px; } .twitter .wing-bottom { top: 121px; left: 80px; width: 70px; height: 70px; } .twitter .wing-bottom-x { top: 106px; left: 58px; width: 60px; height: 60px; } .twitter .wing-middle { top: 95px; left: 68px; width: 88px; height: 73px; } .twitter .wing-middle-x { top: -25px; left: 20px; width: 160px; height: 160px; } .twitter .wing-top { top: 65px; left: 68px; width: 88px; height: 77px; } .twitter .wing-top-x { top: -77px; left: 53px; width: 200px; height: 200px; } .twitter .beak-top { top: 39px; left: 170px; width: 65px; height: 65px; } .twitter .beak-top-x { top: -25px; left: 144px; width: 115px; height: 115px; } .twitter .beak-bottom { top: 21px; left: 145px; width: 100px; height: 100px; } .twitter .beak-bottom-x { top: -14px; left: 155px; width: 115px; height: 115px; }

list.name: Netflix

.tiktok { --white: #fff; --red: #fe2d52; --blue: #28ffff; width: 37px; height: 218px; transform: translate(32px, -40px); background: var(--white); position: relative; } .tiktok::after { box-sizing: content-box;  content: ''; position: absolute; border: 37px solid var(--white); border-top-color: transparent; width: 100px; height: 100px; border-radius: 50%; transform: rotate(45deg); top: 123px; left: -137px; } .tiktok::before { box-sizing: content-box; content: ''; position: absolute; width: 140px; height: 140px; border: 30px solid transparent; border-bottom-color: var(--white); border-radius: 100%; top: -100px; right: -172px; }

.tiktok { --white: #fff; --red: #fe2d52; --blue: #28ffff; width: 37px; height: 218px; transform: translate(32px, -40px); background: var(--white); filter: drop-shadow(-10px -10px 0 var(--blue)); position: relative; } .tiktok::after { box-sizing: content-box;  content: ''; position: absolute; border: 37px solid var(--white); border-top-color: transparent; width: 100px; height: 100px; border-radius: 50%; transform: rotate(45deg); top: 123px; left: -137px; } .tiktok::before { box-sizing: content-box; content: ''; position: absolute; width: 140px; height: 140px; border: 30px solid transparent; border-bottom-color: var(--white); border-radius: 100%; transform: rotate(45deg); top: -100px; right: -172px; }

list.name: Gmail
list.description: A simple envelope with red details @Koushik

steps.code: :root { --red: #d5493c; } .gmail { background-color: #efefef; height: 170px; width: 210px; border-radius: 20px; position: relative; overflow: hidden; }
:root { --red: #d5493c; } .gmail { background-color: #efefef; height: 170px; width: 210px; border-radius: 20px; border-left: 24px solid var(--red); position: relative; overflow: hidden; }

:root { --red: #d5493c; } .gmail { background-color: #efefef; height: 170px; width: 210px; border-radius: 20px; border-left: 24px solid var(--red); border-right: 24px solid var(--red); position: relative; overflow: hidden; }

:root { --red: #d5493c; } .gmail { background-color: #efefef; height: 170px; width: 210px; border-radius: 20px; border-left: 24px solid var(--red); border-right: 24px solid var(--red); position: relative; overflow: hidden; } .gmail::after { box-sizing: content-box; content: ''; position: absolute; width: 100%; height: 100%; top: -73%; left: -10%; box-shadow: 1px 1px 5px #000; background-color: #f2f2f2; border-right: 30px solid #d5493c; border-bottom: 30px solid #d5493c; transform: rotate(54deg) skewY(-19deg) }

steps.description: Un cuadrado simple de color Crimson.
steps.code: :root { --size: 150px; --color: crimson; } .heart { width: var(--size); height: var(--size); background: var(--color); }
:root { --size: 150px; --color: crimson; } .heart { width: var(--size); height: var(--size); background: var(--color); transform: rotate(-135deg); }

:root { --size: 150px; --color: crimson; } .heart { width: var(--size); height: var(--size); background: var(--color); transform: rotate(-135deg); } .heart::before, .heart::after { position: absolute; width: var(--size); height: var(--size); content: ''; background-color: white; } .heart::before { top: 0%; } .heart::after { left: 0%; }

list.name: Google
list.description: The G of the most popular searcher.

steps.code: .google { --blue: #4285f4; --red: #db4437; --yellow: #f4b400; --green: #0f9d58; }
.google { --blue: #4285f4; --red: #db4437; --yellow: #f4b400; --green: #0f9d58; --size: 250px; --border: calc(var(--size) / 5); position: relative; }

.google { --blue: #4285f4; --red: #db4437; --yellow: #f4b400; --green: #0f9d58; --size: 250px; --border: calc(var(--size) / 5); position: relative; } .a { width: var(--size); height: var(--size); background: var(--blue); }

.google { --blue: #4285f4; --red: #db4437; --yellow: #f4b400; --green: #0f9d58; --size: 250px; --border: calc(var(--size) / 5); position: relative; } .a { width: var(--size); height: var(--size); border-top: var(--border) solid var(--red); border-left: var(--border) solid var(--yellow); border-bottom: var(--border) solid var(--green); }

.google { --blue: #4285f4; --red: #db4437; --yellow: #f4b400; --green: #0f9d58; --size: 250px; --border: calc(var(--size) / 5); position: relative; } .a { position: relative; width: var(--size); height: var(--size); border-top: var(--border) solid var(--red); border-left: var(--border) solid var(--yellow); border-bottom: var(--border) solid var(--green); border-right: var(--border) solid transparent; border-radius: calc(4 * var(--border)); z-index: 2; } .b { position: absolute; right: 0; bottom: 0; width: calc(var(--size) / 2); height: calc(var(--size) / 2); border-top: var(--border) solid var(--blue); border-right: var(--border) solid var(--blue); border-bottom: var(--border) solid var(--blue); border-radius: 0 0 var(--size) 0; }

list.name: LG
list.description: Can you see a face in the LG logo?

steps.code: :root { --size: 100px; --border: 4px; } .LG { display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; position: relative; width: var(--size); height: var(--size); border-radius: 50%; background-color: #ea4335; } .G { width: 82%; height: 82%; border: var(--border) solid #fff; border-top: var(--border) solid transparent; border-radius: 50%; transform: rotateZ(45deg); } .LG:before { position: absolute; right: 13%; top: 50%; content: ''; display: block; width: 25%; height: 25%; border-top: var(--border) solid #fff; } .face { position: absolute; top: 30%; left: calc(50% - var(--border)); width: 14%; height: 42%; border: var(--border) solid #fff; border-right: none; border-top: none; } .face::before { position: absolute; right: 20px; content: ''; display: block; background-color: #fff; width: calc(var(--border) * 3); height: calc(var(--border) * 3); border-radius: 50%; }
